description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 16 January 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking proposals from suppliers to provide the Department of National Defence with promotional items for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF).
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)]]},
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Keychain Promotional Items for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide promotional keychain items for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). The items will be used for promotional purposes and will be branded with the RCAF logo.

### Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: WS3815840133
- **Tender Name**: RFP W3373-2203PA - Keychain Promotional Items
- **Publication Date**: 2023-01-06
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-16T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-01-19
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be accepted from suppliers registered in the Government of Canada's supplier database. Evaluation criteria will be based on the combination of technical merit and price. A detailed evaluation methodology will be provided in the tender documents.

### Tender Documents
Prospective bidders can obtain the tender documents via [insert specific link or method]. Tender documents will include detailed specifications and requirements for the keychain promotional items.

### Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact Maxine Holloway at maxine.holloway@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Important Notes
- This is a selective tendering process.
- The lowest priced bid will not necessarily be awarded the contract.
- All bids must be submitted by the closing date and time to be considered valid.
- Late bids will be declared non-responsive.  <!--more-->

I have only included the necessary information and excluded any redundant data. The new rewritten entry is concise, clear, and easy to understand. I formatted the text using Markdown for better readability. 

Please let me know if you have any further requests or modifications to make!
